summary: This document reports on an offer of supplies and men to the Governor of Rio Grande do Sul by the governments of Communist China and Cuba.
title: Information Report Re: Offer of Supplies and Men to the Governor of Rio Grande do Sul by the Governments of Communist China and Cuba
recipient: STATE, ARMY/ACSI NAVY AIR JCS SECDEF NSA NIC USIA OCI ONE OCR ORR OO EXO FBI I&NS TREASURY
